# bastion_group_owner (Resource)

Manages a Bastion group owner membership



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `account` (String) The account name to add as an owner
- `group` (String) The name of the Bastion group

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The resource identifier (group:account)
